item.title: An Invitation to President Trump: Come to Gaza
item.description: Promises of peace between Jews and Palestinians must be turned into reality.

item.title: Laszlo Krasznahorkai Is Awarded Nobel Prize in Literature
item.description: ​The prize committee said the Hungarian writer’s work “reaffirms the power of art.”

item.title: How Jared Kushner, a Self-Described ‘Deal Guy,’ Helped Broker a Gaza Breakthrough

item.title: Government Shutdown Scrambles Some Home Sales in Flood Zones
item.description: When the government shut down, so did the federal flood insurance program, forcing some buyers into the costly private market.

item.title: Trump Baselessly Claims He ‘Took the Freedom of Speech Away’ From Flag Burners
